definitions.definition: Consciously thoughtful and observant (often of other people and their rights, needs, feelings and comfort).
examples: It was very considerate of you to give up your place for your friend.

definitions.definition: Characterised by careful and conscious thought.

main_definition: Consciously thoughtful and observant (often of other people and their rights, needs, feelings and comfort).
secondary_definitions: Characterised by careful and conscious thought.
